mapper.select: SELECT NVL(CPN_SEQ, 0) CPN_SEQ, NVL(CPN_NAME, '') CPN_NAME, NVL(CPN_DESC, '') CPN_DESC, NVL(DISCOUNT_RATE, 0) DISCOUNT_RATE, NVL(DISCOUNT_AMT, 0) DISCOUNT_AMT, NVL(MIN_ORDER_AMT, 0) MIN_ORDER_AMT, ISSUE_START_DT, ISSUE_END_DT, NVL(CPN_TYPE, '') CPN_TYPE, NVL(CPN_STAT, '') CPN_STAT, NVL(TOTAL_CPN_CNT, 0) TOTAL_CPN_CNT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM COUPON ORDER BY CPN_SEQ DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_COUPON ( USER_CPN_SEQ, USER_ID, CPN_SEQ, ISSUE_DT, USER_CPN_IS_USED, USER_CPN_CNT ) VALUES ( SEQ_USER_COUPON_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{cpnSeq}, SYSDATE, 'N', 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_CPN_SEQ, A.USER_ID, A.CPN_SEQ, NVL(B.CPN_NAME,'') CPN_NAME, NVL(B.CPN_DESC,'') CPN_DESC, NVL(B.DISCOUNT_RATE, 0) DISCOUNT_RATE, NVL(B.DISCOUNT_AMT, 0) DISCOUNT_AMT, B.MIN_ORDER_AMT, B.CPN_TYPE, B.CPN_STAT, B.ISSUE_START_DT, B.ISSUE_END_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.ISSUE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') ISSUE_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.USAGE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'),'') USAGE_DT, NVL(A.USER_CPN_IS_USED,'N') USER_CPN_IS_USED, NVL(A.USER_CPN_CNT,0) USER_CPN_CNT FROM USER_COUPON A JOIN COUPON B ON A.CPN_SEQ = B.CPN_SEQ WHERE A.USER_ID = #{value} ORDER BY A.ISSUE_DT DESC

SELECT A.USER_CPN_SEQ, A.USER_ID, A.CPN_SEQ, NVL(B.CPN_NAME, '') CPN_NAME, NVL(B.CPN_DESC, '') CPN_DESC, NVL(B.DISCOUNT_RATE, 0) DISCOUNT_RATE, NVL(B.DISCOUNT_AMT, 0) DISCOUNT_AMT, B.MIN_ORDER_AMT, B.CPN_TYPE, B.CPN_STAT, B.ISSUE_START_DT, B.ISSUE_END_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.ISSUE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') ISSUE_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.USAGE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD'), '') USAGE_DT, NVL(A.USER_CPN_IS_USED, 'N') USER_CPN_IS_USED, NVL(A.USER_CPN_CNT, 0) USER_CPN_CNT FROM USER_COUPON A INNER JOIN COUPON B ON A.CPN_SEQ = B.CPN_SEQ WHERE A.USER_ID = #{value} AND NVL(A.USER_CPN_IS_USED, 'N') = 'N' AND B.CPN_STAT = 'Y' AND A.USER_CPN_IS_USED = 'N' AND TO_CHAR(B.ISSUE_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY B.CPN_SEQ DESC

SELECT CPN_SEQ, CPN_NAME, CPN_DESC, DISCOUNT_RATE, DISCOUNT_AMT, MIN_ORDER_AMT, ISSUE_START_DT, ISSUE_END_DT, CPN_TYPE, CPN_STAT, TOTAL_CPN_CNT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT FROM COUPON WHERE CPN_SEQ = #{cpnSeq}

SELECT A.USER_CPN_SEQ, A.USER_ID, A.CPN_SEQ, NVL(B.CPN_NAME,'') CPN_NAME, NVL(B.CPN_DESC,'') CPN_DESC, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.ISSUE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'') ISSUE_DT, NVL(TO_CHAR(A.USAGE_DT,'YYYY.MM.DD'),'') USAGE_DT, NVL(A.USER_CPN_IS_USED,'N') USER_CPN_IS_USED, NVL(A.USER_CPN_CNT,0) USER_CPN_CNT FROM USER_COUPON A, COUPON B WHERE A.CPN_SEQ = B.CPN_SEQ AND A.USER_ID = #{value}
